item.title: During Ramadan, Volvo is offering special deals on their cars
item.description:
Source: Al-Futtaim Group. The Volvo XC60. Trading Enterprises â€“ Volvo, the sole distributor of Volvo cars in the UAE and a member of the Al-Futtaim Group, has revealed its Ramadan promotional offers for several popular models. The Volvo XC90 and XC60, both luxury SUVs, come with a 20% dealer contribution towards the down payment through the Volvo Selection program. This offer also includes a two-year buyback guarantee and monthly payments starting at AED 2,999 for the XC90 and AED 1,999 for the XC60...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/during-ramadan-volvo-is-offering-special-deals-on-their-cars/

item.title: Changi Airport introduces a new reward for the Be a Changi Millionaire campaign
item.description:
Source: Changi Airport Group. This year’s Be a Changi Millionaire competition offers a chance to win a Volvo sedan as well. Changi Airport has enhanced its well-known *Be a Changi Millionaire*_ retail promotion this year by adding a new prize: a Volvo S90 T5 luxury sedan. This is in addition to the existing S$1 million cash prize. According to Changi Airport, this is the largest retail promotion at any airport globally...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/changi-airport-introduces-a-new-reward-for-the-be-a-changi-millionaire-campaign/
